title: Cheat's sourdough bread
ingredients: ['175ml water', '175ml soured cream, room temperature', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 1/8 teaspoons salt', '340g strong bread flour', '75g barley flour', '2 tablespoons instant mashed potato', '2 tablespoons sugar', '1 1/2 teaspoons dried active baking yeast']
